description: Prior approval notification (Class MA) for partial change of use of existing ground floor and basement from Class E (c) (iii) commercial use to Class C3 residential use to create 1 no. dwellinghouse (flat/ apartment/maisonette).
decision_conditions:
Soundproofing shall be provided to ensure that dwelling houses, flats and rooms for residential purposes sharing a party element with a premises to which this planning permission relates shall receive a minimum airborne sound insulation on the party element which achieves DnT'w of 60 dB before the first use of the development hereby approved. The soundproofing shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.


REASON: To ensure that neighbouring occupiers do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise from activities within the premises
